sentences.en: a cubist painting with angular shapes
sentences.cn: 一幅有棱角图案的立体派绘画

sentences.en: A swarm of planets absorbed most of the available angular momentum.
sentences.cn: 一大群行星吸收了大部分有效角动量.

sentences.en: Angular momentum conservation is based on the isotropy of space.
sentences.cn: 角动量守恒是以空间的各向同性为基础的.

sentences.en: He had an angular face with prominent cheekbones.
sentences.cn: 他的脸棱角分明，颧骨突出。

sentences.en: In undisturbed inertial motion, the angular momentum is constant.
sentences.cn: 在无扰动惯性运动中, 角动量是恒定的.

sentences.en: Now we may discuss the effects of angular orientation upon physical laws.
sentences.cn: 现在我们来讨论角方位对物理定律的影响.

sentences.en: She was no longer as softly pleasing, more angular.
sentences.cn: 她已不再象从前那样温柔可爱了, 瘦削了一些.

sentences.en: Such sandstones should have similar angular relations to the strike valleys.
sentences.cn: 这种砂岩体与走向谷之间与有类似的交角关系.

sentences.en: That is, the angular velocity is more than doubled.
sentences.cn: 即所得的末角速度大于原来的二倍.

sentences.en: The angular frequency of the disturbing force called the impressed frequency.
sentences.cn: 扰动力的角频率称为外加频率.

sentences.en: The precise definition of the angular momentum of a body is complicated.
sentences.cn: 要给物体的角动量下精确的定义是困难的.

sentences.en: The radome causes an angular displacement of the tracking aerial polar diagram.
sentences.cn: 天线罩使跟踪天线的极图产生了角位移.

sentences.en: The shadow on the perfect lawn were straight and angular.
sentences.cn: 几条黑影横卧在碧绿的草坪上,显得直溜溜的,棱角分明.

sentences.en: The shambling of his angular figure now directed him to a lean - to.
sentences.cn: 他瘦削的身子踉踉跄跄地朝那间披屋走去.

sentences.en: The smallest characteristic value corresponds to the lowest natural angular frequency.
sentences.cn: 最小的特征值相当于最低固有角频率.

sentences.en: This is equivalent to an angular distribution of constituent plane waves.
sentences.cn: 这等价于各种成分的平面波的角分布.

words.tran_cn: [生物]有角的；生硬的，笨拙的；瘦削的

phrases.tran_cn: 向心推力球轴承；角面接触滚珠轴承；径向止推滚珠轴承
角度偏差；角偏移；角偏向

trans.tran_cn: 有角的，用角测量的，用弧度测量的，生硬的，笨拙的，（人）瘦削的
